sec.p: This paper was prepared through the support of the Division of Behavioral Health and Recovery, Washington State Department of Social and Health Services. The views in the paper represent the view of the authors only. We are grateful for the many clinicians, providers and administrators who provided feedback on the tools presented in this paper. We thank Ellie Qian for her assistance in preparing the manuscript. The paper was presented in part at the 2018 NIMH Mental Health Services Meeting.
